name: The Snowball Game
description:
The Snowball Game, created for Great Winter Game Jam 2020!

  • Move mouse up and down to control the snowball.
  • Left click to send a snowball that crushes any icicles. Beware, for this costs you health!
  • Collect gifts to increase your score.
  • Collect ice balls to replenish health.

BEST PLAYED WITH A MOUSE

Note: Not only is this my first game jam, but my first game I have made in general. As lackluster or buggy it is, I'm pretty happy with how it came out!
